password.description: Password (must be unique for all the devices)

exposeSwitch.description: Choose how to expose the shelly switches: as a switch (don't use it for Alexa), light or outlet

exposeInput.description: Choose how to expose the shelly inputs: disabled, contact, momentary or latching switch

exposePowerMeter.description: Choose how to expose the shelly power meters: disabled, matter13 (will use Matter 1.3 electricalSensor) or evehistory (use Matter EveHistoryCluster)

blackList.description: The devices in the list will not be exposed. Use the device id (e.g. shellyplus2pm-5443b23d81f8)

whiteList.description: Only the devices in the list will be exposed. Use the device id (e.g. shellyplus2pm-5443b23d81f8)

deviceIp.description: Set the IP address for each device. Enter in the first field the shelly ID of the device and in the second field the IP address. (e.g. shelly1minig3-543204547478: 192.168.1.221)

enableMdnsDiscover.description: Enable the mdns discovery for shelly devices (it will stop after 10 minutes)

enableStorageDiscover.description: Enable storage discovery for shelly devices (it will load from the storage the devices already discovered)

resetStorageDiscover.description: Reset the storage discovery on the next restart (it will clear the storage of already discovered devices)

enableConfigDiscover.description: Enable config discovery for shelly devices (it will load the devices from deviceIp config setting)

enableBleDiscover.description: Enable ble discovery for shelly devices (under development)

debug.description: Enable the debug for the plugin (development only)

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown (development only)
